page.title: 09LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: {Kilkhampton clubs:}In 1983 a{youth {club}was formed for children 11-16 years old.This meets every wednesday at 7pm.There is an over{60's club which meets every tuesday afternoon in The Grenville Rooms.A darts club meets every thursday in The Grenville Rooms from 7.30-9pm.About 45 people are members. {Skittles teams} meet on thursdays at 7pm for home matches and 7.30 for away matches.The season runs from September to March.The Grenville Rooms have three teams and The London Inn and The New Inn,one each. {The Badminton Club}meet on mondays from 7pm-10pm and from 8pm-10pm on wednesdays at The Grenville Rooms and have a mixed membership of 30
